column4: Hello, I'm running fluxbox on Ubuntu and I want to setup a VPN. How do I go about accessing the network manager? Picture of what I mean: http://www.kabatology.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/11/netwk-connect.png
No, I found a picture on the net
click the network thing then VPN Connections? :)
I use fluxbox. It's not there
